Text: thx mate any chance of the cowboy game

Hello Phatwarez...  I appreciate your uploading of the Seahawks last year.  I didn't miss a week.  Can i assume that since you did not upload week 2, that you will not be doing the remainder of the seahawks games?  

It would be great if you could upload all the NFL games.  I was watching about 3-4 games a week last year.

Thank You...
